evidence.text: Person B: Then go play with your stupid doll.
Person B: Mommy, Marcelo broke my doll.
Person B: Mom, you did it.

Person B: When did you bury him?
Person B: The day you realized he wasn't coming back?
Person A: I think it was when I saw Mom donating his clothes. About a year and a half later. What about you?
Person B: I think it was when we left Rio. Seeing the house all empty.
Person B: We're about to find out.
